courses.title: Latin 101 – Beginner Grammar & Vocabulary
courses.description: Introduction to basic Latin grammar, declensions, and essential vocabulary for beginners.

courses.title: Latin 102 – Intermediate Grammar & Reading
courses.description: Expand your Latin knowledge with intermediate grammar concepts and reading practice.

courses.title: Latin 103 – Latin Literature & Composition
courses.description: Study classical Latin literature and learn to compose in Latin.

courses.title: Latin 104 – Advanced Translation & Prose
courses.description: Master advanced translation techniques and analyze complex Latin prose.

courses.title: Algebra 101 – Foundations of Algebra
courses.description: Build a strong foundation in algebraic concepts and operations.

courses.title: Algebra 102 – Equations & Inequalities
courses.description: Learn to solve various types of equations and inequalities.

courses.title: Algebra 103 – Polynomials & Functions
courses.description: Explore polynomial operations and function theory.

courses.title: Algebra 104 – Advanced Algebra Concepts
courses.description: Master advanced algebraic concepts and problem-solving techniques.

courses.title: History 101 – Ancient Civilizations
courses.description: Explore the rise and fall of ancient civilizations around the world.

courses.title: History 102 – Medieval History
courses.description: Study the medieval period from the fall of Rome to the Renaissance.

courses.title: History 103 – Modern History
courses.description: Analyze modern history from the Enlightenment to the present day.

courses.title: Philosophy 101 – Introduction to Philosophy
courses.description: Introduction to major philosophical questions and thinkers.

courses.title: Philosophy 102 – Ethics & Logic
courses.description: Study ethical theories and develop logical reasoning skills.

courses.title: Spanish 101 – Beginner Spanish
courses.description: Learn basic Spanish grammar, vocabulary, and conversation skills.

courses.title: Spanish 102 – Intermediate Spanish
courses.description: Advance your Spanish with intermediate grammar and cultural topics.

courses.title: Biology 101 – Cellular & Molecular Biology
courses.description: Study the fundamental principles of cellular and molecular biology.

courses.title: Biology 102 – Genetics & Evolution
courses.description: Explore genetics, heredity, and evolutionary biology.

courses.title: Computer Science 101 – Intro to Programming
courses.description: Learn fundamental programming concepts and problem-solving techniques.

courses.title: Computer Science 102 – Data Structures & Algorithms
courses.description: Master essential data structures and algorithmic thinking.
